title: NICS Denial Notification Act of 2016
content: NICS Denial Notification Act of 2016 This bill amends the federal criminal code to require the Department of Justice (DOJ) to report certain information to state and local law enforcement authorities following a determination, by the National Instant Criminal Background Check System, that a prospective firearm purchaser is a prohibited person . DOJ must report to Congress on the categories of prohibited persons who are most likely to engage in criminal activity.
